sentence:
• Shares of Arena Pharmaceuticals, Inc. ARNA rallied 28.7% after reporting that its ulcerative colitis treatment showed improvement in patients during mid-stage trials
• MuleSoft, Inc.'s MULE shares rallied 27.2% after it agreed to be acquired by salesforce.com, inc. CRM for an undisclosed amount
• The Children's Place, Inc.'s PLCE shares declined 7.9% after reporting fourth quarter 2017 revenues of $570 million, below the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $570.4 million
• Shares of HealthEquity, Inc. HQY surged 11.5% after reporting fiscal fourth quarter 2018 earnings per share of $0.11, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.06
